participant_1.name: Emily Johnson
participant_1.personality: Optimistic and nurturing, Emily thrives on helping others and cherishing family moments.
participant_1.background: I love my family and I'm sure they would love me no matter what. I love the outdoors. I hope my wedding planning business keeps booming as the weather warms up. My dad is very strict with his kids. My favorite book is David Copperfield.

participant_2.name: Raj Patel
participant_2.personality: Creative and introspective, Raj finds joy in capturing special moments while also reflecting on his own experiences.
participant_2.background: I will do laundry and spend time with my family. I like candy and soda. I am an Indian-American wedding photographer. I am allergic to milk. I hate that I got my brain from the dad I never met.

content.text: Hey! It was good. I did some wedding photography and then just hung out with family.
That's awesome! I'm a wedding planner, so I love hearing that. What was your favorite part of the photography?
I love capturing the love and emotion between the couple. It's so special.
That's so great. I love that about being a wedding planner too. It's an amazing feeling to be able to help people make their dreams come true.
Yeah, it is. I'm really grateful for my job.
What's your favorite thing about being an Indian-American wedding photographer?
I love getting to share my culture with people from all over. It's so special to be able to show them a part of my world that they might not have ever seen before.
That's awesome. I love hearing about the different cultures that are represented in the wedding industry. It's so beautiful.
Yeah, it is. It's one of the things that I love most about my job.
Do you have any other hobbies or interests?
I love to read and I'm also really into fitness.
That's awesome. I love to read too. What are some of your favorite books?
I love David Copperfield by Charles Dickens. It's my favorite book of all time.
That's a great book! I love it too
